question.title: Data in Widget disappears after placing it android
question.body:
Data in my widget is disappearing when I place it on the screen. Only the layout is showing.

<appwidget-provider xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
android:initialLayout="@layout/widget_layout_small"
android:minHeight="40dp"
android:minWidth="350dp"
android:updatePeriodMillis="1800000"
android:previewImage="@drawable/widget_small">
</appwidget-provider>

answers.body:
The issue was that I did not add the following code to my provider file

android:configure:"com.example.widgets.WidgetProvider"

Fixed code is:

<appwidget-provider xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    android:initialLayout="@layout/widget_layout_small"
    android:minHeight="40dp"
    android:minWidth="350dp"
    android:updatePeriodMillis="1800000"
    android:configure="com.example.widgets.WidgetProvider"
    android:previewImage="@drawable/widget_small">
</appwidget-provider>

79641723.body: You're most definitely correct. I'm still midway solving the problem. Thanks for the inisght

I think you might have misinterpreted your observations. That attribute is for a configuration Activity, not your AppWidgetProvider: developer.android.com/develop/ui/views/…. Perhaps you had some other issue that you unknowingly resolved at the same time you tried this.
